techmeme.title: Sam Altman's World Network unveils World Chat, a "mini app" in the World App wallet for messaging and sending and receiving crypto, in beta on Android and iOS (Margaux Nijkerk/CoinDesk)
Trump signs an EO to establish a Strategic Bitcoin Reserve and a Digital Asset Stockpile, with BTC and other digital assets forfeited in criminal or civil cases (Jesse Coghlan/Cointelegraph)
A Brazilian judge gives Apple 90 days to allow sideloading on iOS in Brazil, saying the "limitations" imposed by Apple on developers could stifle competition (Filipe Espósito/9to5Mac)
DoubleZero, which is coordinating a global network of fiber optic cables to improve blockchains, raised $28M in a token round, sources say at a $400M valuation (Danny Nelson/CoinDesk)
The US Department of Labor has been investigating Scale AI for compliance with the Fair Labor Standards Act, a source says since at least August 2024 (Charles Rollet/TechCrunch)
